mapper.insert: insert into board_category(category_en_name, category_kr_name, board_en_name) values (#{categoryEnName}, #{categoryKrName}, #{boardEnName})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.category_code_name from board_content b left join board_category_code c on c.category_code_id = b.category_code_id where content_id = #{contentId}

select * from board_category_code left join board_category on board_category_code.category_id = board_category.category_id
AND board_category_code.category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply(content_id, parent_id, parent_reply_id, reply_content, reply_writer) values (#{contentId}, #{parentId}, #{parentReplyId}, #{replyContent}, #{replyWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY c.board_en_name ORDER BY c.content_id DESC, c.content_id DESC) AS RN FROM board_content AS c ) AS t WHERE t.RN <= 5
